title: Group Discussion - The Flow from Storyboard to User Stories to Use Case to Design

quizDescription.text:
Purpose of the Activity
The purpose of this exercise is to consider what the story will be that will serve as the starting point for the design of the calculator.

attachment: 09 Group Discussion - The Flow from Storyboard to User Stories to Use Case to Design.pdf

questions.questionText: Summarize the Group Discussion - The Flow from Storyboard to User Stories to Use Case to Design
